description: Stay connected to Alamance County wherever you go, with the official mobile companion to the Times-News. Get high-quality news around the clock from our trusted reporters. Access local news stories, sports, entertainment, videos and much more. Simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading at your convenience. Share content through E-Mail, Facebook and Twitter. If you like our app spread the word to friends on Facebook and Twitter. If you want to know what is going on in Alamance County, The Times-News app is a must. The Times-News, more than a newspaper.  The Times-News app is a free ad-supported application
